original_text: He will not be rich. He will lose his valuable things. Everything that he has will disappear. He will not be rich.
korean_text: 그는 부요하지 못하고 재산이 보존되지 못하고 그의 소유가 땅에서 증식되지 못할 것이라

sentences.original_text: He will lose his valuable things.
Everything that he has will disappear.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 가진 모든 것은 사라질 것이다.
